org.opentcs.util.eventsystem

接口 EventFilter<E extends Event>

  • 类型参数:
    E - The actual event implementation.
    所有已知实现类:
    AcceptingTCSEventFilter, RefusingTCSEventFilter, TCSObjectEventFilter
    已过时。 
    EventSource.addEventListener(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventListener, org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventFilter) will be removed.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public interface EventFilter<E extends Event>
    Implementations of this interface filter events and can be used to prevent unwanted events from reaching EventListeners.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean accept(E event)
      已过时。 
      Checks if this filter accepts a given event.

    • 方法详细资料

      • accept

        boolean accept(E event)
        已过时。 
        Checks if this filter accepts a given event.
        参数:
        event - The event to check.
        返回:
        true if this filter accepts the event, else false.
